mapper.select: SELECT TASK_UNQ ,ENTP_UNQ ,CUST_UNQ ,TASK_USR_UNQ ,TASK_USR_NM ,TASK_TP ,TASK_ST_DT ,TASK_ST_TM ,TASK_ED_DT ,TASK_ED_TM ,TASK_JOB_TP ,SVC_EFC ,STT_MONTH_TOTAL_CNT ,STT_MONTH_S_CNT ,STT_MONTH_F_CNT ,STT_DAY_TOTAL_CNT ,STT_DAY_S_CNT ,STT_DAY_F_CNT ,TASK_MEMO FROM STT_ENTP_TASK_LST WHERE 1 = 1 AND TASK_UNQ = #{task_unq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_TASK_ATCH_LST( TASK_UNQ, ENTP_UNQ, ATCH_FILE_NM, ATCH_FILE_ORG_NM, ATCH_FILE_PATH, ATCH_FILE_SIZE, GNR_MEMO, REG_USR_ID, REG_DTM, CHG_USR_ID, CHG_DTM, DEL_YN ) VALUES ( #{task_unq}, #{entp_unq}, #{atch_file_nm}, #{atch_file_org_nm}, #{atch_file_path}, #{atch_file_size}, #{gnr_memo}, #{reg_usr_id}, now(), #{chg_usr_id}, now(), 'N' )
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_TASK_ATCH_LST SET DEL_YN = "y" ,CHG_USR_ID = #{chg_usr_id} ,CHG_DTM = now() WHERE ATCH_FILE_UNQ = #{atch_file_unq}

UPDATE STT_ENTP_TASK_LST AS T LEFT JOIN TBL_TASK_ATCH_LST AS F ON T.TASK_UNQ = F.TASK_UNQ SET T.DEL_YN = 'Y' ,F.DEL_YN = 'Y' ,T.CHG_USR_ID = #{chg_usr_id} ,T.CHG_DTM = now() ,F.CHG_USR_ID = #{chg_usr_id} ,F.CHG_DTM = now() WHERE T.TASK_UNQ = #{task_unq}
